comment: Pre-review COMPLIANT. Verified: (1) Frontmatter title='CR-028-VAR-001: SDLC-QMS Config Limitation', revision_summary='Initial draft' (N/A for v0.x); (2) All required VAR sections per SOP-004 Section 9A.3 present: Variance Identification, Detailed Description, Root Cause, Variance Type (System Error), Impact Assessment, Proposed Resolution, Resolution Work (4 EIs), VAR Closure, References; (3) VAR Type 1 appropriate - config limitation completely blocks parent CR-028 at EI-1; (4) Parent CR-028 verified IN_EXECUTION; (5) No placeholder content in narrative (execution table placeholders acceptable per SOP-004 Section 4.2); (6) No typos or formatting errors found; (7) Proposed resolution is well-structured with clear execution items mapping to the 5-step plan.

NON-COMPLIANT: Section 7 Resolution Comments table contains placeholder content: [COMMENT] and [PERFORMER] - [DATE]. These template placeholders must be either (1) removed entirely leaving only the table header, or (2) replaced with actual comment entries. No other deficiencies found - execution evidence verified: EI-1 through EI-4 all Pass, 198 tests confirmed, SDLC-QMS-RS created successfully.

Re-review complete. Previous deficiency (placeholder in Resolution Comments) has been corrected. Verified: (1) Frontmatter title: 'CR-028-VAR-001: SDLC-QMS Config Limitation' - present and accurate; (2) All 9 required sections present and complete; (3) No placeholder content (TBD/TODO/FIXME) found; (4) Resolution Comments now contains actual content: 'Resolution executed per plan. No issues encountered.'; (5) All 4 EIs show Pass with execution summaries; (6) VAR Closure complete with Resolved outcome; (7) Traceability to CR-028 (parent), CR-029, SOP-004 verified. Document is COMPLIANT.
